s1paragraph1.text: Unlocking Success with Dwayne Johnson: Determination, Humility, and Hard Work

s2paragraph1.text: Wake up determined. Go to bed satisfied.

s3paragraph1.text: Always asked, ‘What’s the key to success?’ The key is, there is no key. Be humble, hungry, and always be the hardest worker in the room.

s4paragraph1.text: Success isn’t overnight. It’s when every day you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up.

s5paragraph1.text: The first step to achieving your goal, is to take a moment to respect your goal. Know what it means to you to achieve it.

s6paragraph1.text: There is no substitute for hard work. Always be humble and hungry.

s7paragraph1.text: All successes begin with Self-Discipline. It starts with you.

s9paragraph1.text: One hard day of work proves you have heart. But day after day is what proves you have maturity and commitment.
